note_content: Patient reports frequent thoughts about ending his life. States he thinks about suicide 'almost every day' but when asked about method, says 'I haven't really thought about how, I just want the pain to stop.' No specific plan identified. No means acquired. Denies intent to act. Reports these thoughts started after divorce was finalized. Safety plan reviewed and updated.
test_type: Active SI without plan - thoughts present but no specific method identified
